'''Prismarine bricks''' are a variant of [[prismarine]], appearing as cyan bricks with chiseled patterns. <br>

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Prismarine bricks only drops itself when mined with a pickaxe. If mined by any other [[tool]], it [[drops]] nothing.
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Prismarine Bricks|Pickaxe|Wood}}

=== Natural generation ===
Prismarine bricks naturally generate as the main blocks making up [[ocean monument]]s. Prismarine bricks are found in large amounts due to the size of the structure. Prismarine bricks make up the 23 pillars below the monument, and appear decoratively throughout the structure.

== Usage ==
=== Conduit power ===
{{main|Conduit}}
Prismarine bricks can be used to activate a conduit by building a structure around it. By doing this, the conduit emits the "[[Conduit Power]]" [[effect]] in a certain radius, depending on how many blocks are used to power it. [[Sea lantern]]s, [[prismarine]] and [[Dark Prismarine|dark prismarine]] can also be used for this purpose.
